content: a triangular shawl worked in 8 colours and a fabulous array of **tunisian crochet** stitches and techniques it is worked top-down with mitered increases down the centre finished with a border of crab stitch along the longest side and tassels at each corner **size** wingspan = 165cm/65 inches centre depth = 84cm/33 inches **materials** 6 0mm tunisian crochet hook with a long and flexible cable stitch marker approximately 212 yards of dk yarn for shade a 115 yards of dk yarn for shade b 118 yards of dk yarn for shade c 110 yards of dk yarn for shade d 102 yards of dk yarn for shade e 112 yards of dk yarn for shade f 102 yards of dk yarn for shade g 115 yards of dk yarn for shade h i have used blacker yarns lyonesse dk in shades onyx aquamarine citrine emerald dark pearl serpentine tourmaline and sapphire but you can use any 8 colours of any brand you like **please note** *that this pattern does not teach you how to tunisian crochet but contains a variety of stitches and techniques for you to expand upon your existing tunisian crochet skills *
